title: Quincy Center walk to T, balcony, AC, DW
posting_body: ['The rent for this apartment includes the heat & hot water, so you would pay for electricity (the electric bills we see normally run about $45-$55 per month when the AC is not running), phone, cable, etc.', ' Rent is based on occupancy by, no more than, one person – if more than one person is to occupy the apartment, a higher rent will apply.', 'The apartment is well suited for someone who does not have a car and needs to be close to public transportation (but please note there is a parking lot for off street parking).', " The walk from the building to the Quincy Center T station is 6/10ths of a mile, so it should take somewhere around 6-9 minutes (also, bus line route #'s 220, 221 & 222 stop in front of the building), there is a supermarket about a 5–6 minute walk away, and it is about a 5-6 minute walk to the shops and restaurants of Hancock Street in Quincy Center.", ' If you need to be close to the highway, on most days it is much less than a 10-minute drive to the intersection of Routes 3, 93, and 95 (a.k.a. 128).', 'The apartment is on the 2nd floor of the building (there is an elevator in the building too).', ' There is carpeting throughout the apartment (in the pictures the carpet can appear to be different colors; it is a darker mocha brown with white highlights).', ' The living area overall measures 25’ x 14’, which includes an eat in kitchen area (which measures 9’ x 12’), a sliding glass door out to a private balcony (the balcony measures 13-1/2’ x 4’) and an air conditioner.', ' On the other side of the eat-in kitchen area is the work in kitchen, which measures 7-1/2’ x 7’, along with a good amount of cabinet and counter space, has a stove, a refrigerator and a dishwasher.', ' The bedroom measures 14’ x 10’, and it will fit an entire king size bedroom set.', ' There is also a full bathroom (a tub with a shower) that has a linen closet just outside of the bathroom door.', 'The building itself has security locks on the doors, an intercom system, coin operated washers and dryers downstairs and a parking lot for off street parking.', ' We do not allow dogs but some other pets (specifically cats) are acceptable.', 'If you would like more information on the apartment, please send us your email address (please be aware that if you just send through craigslist and do not enter your email address in to the message body we DO NOT get your email address) along with your name and a phone number where you may be reached at directly during the day.', 'As a landlord, we are not usually available to make phone calls after 3:30 PM or so because we are busy meeting with people that we have been able to speak with during the day after they get out of work (such things as showing apartments, taking applications, doing leases, etc.).', ' Please', 'note that we will not discuss the apartment with 3rd parties -- we will discuss the apartment only with the', 'person who the apartment is for, and that we will not respond to any email questions without a phone number (it just is not time efficient to send back and forth when a quick conversation can resolve all issues/questions).', 'Thank you.', '.']
